channel.title: Logical
channel.description:
_ _ "-"_Logical_"-" Version: 1
Before I spill the beans on how good this server is [At least i think its good] I would like to say that this is NOT going to be the only version, I will be inversting some time in this. LOL and befor you post "All you did was follow tutorials" Yeah I did, got a problem with that? I also added a bunch of other stuff...
BTW: I also leeched the client Owner and co-owner icons from... jerome or jerome 1SOMETHINGSOMETHINGSOMETHIN, whichever one really released it. ************************************************** *********************************** Changes [V1] (Client and server) ************************************************** *********************************** (Client) - Changed the GUI, to make it more apealing to the eye - Added and removed some un-needed things in client.java and in GUI.java - Added Download music - Added Music buttons insted of a drop down menu [DDM]
(Server - going to try to add everything) - New HD left click - Removed MD5 Incription - I organised delta files! There not all just in one folder, its .java files in one folder and it gets compiled in another folder - Added welcome bots - EXP lock - Removed quests - Clan chat - GS and other Stances with special attacks - Changed options tab - New barrows - Added ipanel V2 - Changed Pest control interface - Full skills [regular delta] - Added d-claws with spec - Added PVP Weapons - EXP lock - Sara sword - rewrote autospawn.config - Added owner icon - fixed Donator icon
Not notiable things: - Made client.java smaller - Edited specials - Made more commands
************************************************** *********************************** Included programs: ************************************************** *********************************** - Added 317 tools - Music downloader - Webpage viwer
*Tutorials on how to change the programs will come later ************************************************** *********************************** upcomming Changes [V2] (Server) ************************************************** *********************************** - full godwars - add pest control monsters - link infraction system with 3 infraction = temp ban - link infraction system with 5 infraction = ban - Make RSPS engine (Client.java) smaller [Again] - hook server up to a database, with easy webpage installation [Might come out in V3] - redo npcdrops.config - Change Icon - Add infraction system - More...
************************************************** *********************************** Commands [V1] ************************************************** *********************************** Some commands speak for them self... but what ever, this is noob frendly!
Deltas commands: - resetdrop = resets drops - newitem = Refreshes items - tz = How many times you killed jad - prayer = shows current prayer bounus - people = Shows users - mypos = Your position - combat {Number} = Sets you combat to the Number - emote {Emote ID} = Acts out the emote - npc {NPC ID} = Spawns NPC [Gets deleted when its restarted] - spawn {NPC ID} = Makes a spawn line autospawn2 that you can place in autospawn [Makes the npc move] - yell {Message} = Sends a message to everyone - pass {New PW} = Changes pass word - bootall = Kick everyone - kick {Player name} = kick player - master = Gives you 99 everything - npcreset = kills all the NPCs - gfx {GFX ID} = Sends out GFX - switch = Changes spellbook - interface = Shows interface - tele {X} {Y] = Teles you to that position - copy {Player name} = Copy users equipment - jail {Player name} = Jails the user - xteletome {Player name} = Teles the user to you - xteleto {Player name} = Makes the user go to you - bank = Opens bank - empty = Clears invientory - Pickup {Item ID} {Amount} = Spawns item
New commands - hit = Shows max hit - sethp = sets a users hp [Needs work] - spec = 5000% added to your spec bar - cckick {Name} = Kicks player from you clan chat - ccleave = Leaves clan chat - ccdelete = Deletes clan chat - ccrename = Renames your clan chat - ccmake = makes a clan chat - ccjoin {Name} = joins clan chat - cm {Message} = Sends a message to everyone in your clan chat [Need to be the owner of cc] - zombie = Everyone dances [Was expirementing] - message {Message} = You send your message to everyplayer - add {Player name} = Gives that player donator - mod {Player name} = Makes that player a mod - admin {Player name} = Makes that player admin - unmute {Player name} = Unmutes player - unban {Player name} = Unbans player - getpass {Player name} = Gets the players pass - banuser {Player name} = bans user - ipban {Player name} = Ipbans user - mute {Player name} = Mutes user - ipmute {Player name} = Ipmutes user - giveowner {Player name} = Gives player owner - demote {Player name} = Makes the player a player - staffzone = Bring you to the staff zone - unjail {Player name} = Unjails the user - alltome = Teles everyone to you
************************************************** *********************************** Pictures ************************************************** *********************************** co owner icon [img]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/3174/coowner.jpg[/img] donator icon [img]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/5721/donator.jpg[/img] EXP lock + Welcome bots [img]http://img692.imageshack.us/img692/9342/explockwelcomebots.jpg[/img] GS Stance + Left click [Also 100% Gs spec] [img]http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/2323/gsleftclick.jpg[/img] Home [img]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/2831/homexg.jpg[/img] Owner icon [img]http://img686.imageshack.us/img686/3628/owner.jpg[/img]
More will come soon ************************************************** *********************************** Download link ************************************************** *********************************** Client: http://68b351b0.realfiles.net Source [v1] - New style: http://a9902eae.realfiles.net
************************************************** *********************************** Other ************************************************** *********************************** - I do not let people re-upload this to another hosting site! - Canadians can not download this - I migh release V2, if you guys like it ill relase it... and if no one bitches and complains about sharecash link, then ill upload v2 to megaupload or multyupload - I will be adding tutorials on rune-server on how to change some things i did to the server
Hopefully you read what this topic is about befor you post or troll!

item.title: Logical
item.dc:creator: @rolls rolls
item.description:
@rolls wrote:

_ _
“-“Logical”-”
Version: 1

Before I spill the beans on how good this server is [At least i think its good] I would like to say that this is NOT going to be the only version, I will be inversting some time in this.
LOL and befor you post “All you did was follow tutorials” Yeah I did, got a problem with that? I also added a bunch of other stuff…

BTW: I also leeched the client Owner and co-owner icons from… jerome or jerome 1SOMETHINGSOMETHINGSOMETHIN, whichever one really released it.

Changes [V1] (Client and server)

(Client)

  • Changed the GUI, to make it more apealing to the eye
  • Added and removed some un-needed things in client.java and in GUI.java
  • Added Download music
  • Added Music buttons insted of a drop down menu [DDM]

(Server - going to try to add everything)

  • New HD left click
  • Removed MD5 Incription
  • I organised delta files! There not all just in one folder, its .java files in one folder and it gets compiled in another folder
  • Added welcome bots
  • EXP lock
  • Removed quests
  • Clan chat
  • GS and other Stances with special attacks
  • Changed options tab
  • New barrows
  • Added ipanel V2
  • Changed Pest control interface
  • Full skills [regular delta]
  • Added d-claws with spec
  • Added PVP Weapons
  • EXP lock
  • Sara sword
  • rewrote autospawn.config
  • Added owner icon
  • fixed Donator icon

Not notiable things:

  • Made client.java smaller
  • Edited specials
  • Made more commands

Included programs:

  • Added 317 tools
  • Music downloader
  • Webpage viwer

*Tutorials on how to change the programs will come later

upcomming Changes [V2] (Server)

  • full godwars
  • add pest control monsters
  • link infraction system with 3 infraction = temp ban
  • link infraction system with 5 infraction = ban
  • Make RSPS engine (Client.java) smaller [Again]
  • hook server up to a database, with easy webpage installation [Might come out in V3]
  • redo npcdrops.config
  • Change Icon
  • Add infraction system
  • More…

Commands [V1]

Some commands speak for them self… but what ever, this is noob frendly!

Deltas commands:

  • resetdrop = resets drops
  • newitem = Refreshes items
  • tz = How many times you killed jad
  • prayer = shows current prayer bounus
  • people = Shows users
  • mypos = Your position
  • combat {Number} = Sets you combat to the Number
  • emote {Emote ID} = Acts out the emote
  • npc {NPC ID} = Spawns NPC [Gets deleted when its restarted]
  • spawn {NPC ID} = Makes a spawn line autospawn2 that you can place in autospawn [Makes the npc move]
  • yell {Message} = Sends a message to everyone
  • pass {New PW} = Changes pass word
  • bootall = Kick everyone
  • kick {Player name} = kick player
  • master = Gives you 99 everything
  • npcreset = kills all the NPCs
  • gfx {GFX ID} = Sends out GFX
  • switch = Changes spellbook
  • interface = Shows interface
  • tele {X} {Y] = Teles you to that position
  • copy {Player name} = Copy users equipment
  • jail {Player name} = Jails the user
  • xteletome {Player name} = Teles the user to you
  • xteleto {Player name} = Makes the user go to you
  • bank = Opens bank
  • empty = Clears invientory
  • Pickup {Item ID} {Amount} = Spawns item

New commands

  • hit = Shows max hit
  • sethp = sets a users hp [Needs work]
  • spec = 5000% added to your spec bar
  • cckick {Name} = Kicks player from you clan chat
  • ccleave = Leaves clan chat
  • ccdelete = Deletes clan chat
  • ccrename = Renames your clan chat
  • ccmake = makes a clan chat
  • ccjoin {Name} = joins clan chat
  • cm {Message} = Sends a message to everyone in your clan chat [Need to be the owner of cc]
  • zombie = Everyone dances [Was expirementing]
  • message {Message} = You send your message to everyplayer
  • add {Player name} = Gives that player donator
  • mod {Player name} = Makes that player a mod
  • admin {Player name} = Makes that player admin
  • unmute {Player name} = Unmutes player
  • unban {Player name} = Unbans player
  • getpass {Player name} = Gets the players pass
  • banuser {Player name} = bans user
  • ipban {Player name} = Ipbans user
  • mute {Player name} = Mutes user
  • ipmute {Player name} = Ipmutes user
  • giveowner {Player name} = Gives player owner
  • demote {Player name} = Makes the player a player
  • staffzone = Bring you to the staff zone
  • unjail {Player name} = Unjails the user
  • alltome = Teles everyone to you

Pictures

co owner icon

donator icon

EXP lock + Welcome bots

GS Stance + Left click [Also 100% Gs spec]

Home

Owner icon

More will come soon

Download link

Client: http://68b351b0.realfiles.net
Source [v1] - New style: http://a9902eae.realfiles.net

Other

  • I do not let people re-upload this to another hosting site!
  • Canadians can not download this
  • I migh release V2, if you guys like it ill relase it… and if no one bitches and complains about sharecash link, then ill upload v2 to megaupload or multyupload
  • I will be adding tutorials on rune-server on how to change some things i did to the server

Hopefully you read what this topic is about befor you post or troll!

Read full topic
